remarks: Determinant is invariant under transposition.  Proposition 4.8 in [Lang] p. 514.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mdettpos.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdettpos.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdettpos.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mdettpos $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( D ` tpos M ) = ( D ` M ) ) $.
